__e: The man you hope to harm is the one true prophet of our most holy church.

Yes! I am the Prophet of god, he said, but even I do not know what will become of me
Prophet and Cooper are talking to the girl's father.
Was not I the one you left that false prophet and all your other lovers for?
That he is not the prophet, and that he never was.
